text: did you know over 5 million players
didn't get the first achievement in
Elden ring there is an achievement in
Elden ring for reaching the round table
hold which is usually accessed by most
players within 1 to 2 hours of game time
and after 2 years of the game being out
and over 25 million copies sold only
achievement that means a total of 5.5
million players either got stuck at the
tree Sentinel and didn't know you could
skip it or a ton of players didn't make
it far enough into the game to ever
discover the table and from software got
$330 million off of players that didn't
